name: hello 8 in 1 Mighty Multi-Tasker Fluoride Toothpaste Pack, SLS Free Toothpaste with Fluoride, Antigingivitis and Antisensitivity, Strengthens Enamel and Whitens, Natural Mint Blend, 2 Ct, 4.0 Oz Tubes
short_description: WHAT I’M GETTING: Two (2) 4.0 oz tubes of hello 8 in 1 Mighty Multi-Tasker Fluoride Toothpaste, Natural Mint Blend

product_description: Say hello to your new squeeze, the totally epic hello 8 in 1 Mighty Multi-Tasker Fluoride Toothpaste. This hello toothpaste pack contains two tubes of fluoride toothpaste so there’s always a friendly toothpaste ready to greet you when you need it. In addition, this SLS free toothpaste is thoughtfully formulated to help crush cavities, tartar, plaque, gingivitis, and tooth sensitivity. It does all this while brilliantly whitening your teeth and strengthening your teeth enamel. Plus, this hello toothpaste with fluoride totally rocks minty freshness and tastes fantastic. Wow, now that’s friendly. hello 8 in 1 Mighty Multi-Tasker Fluoride Toothpaste contains no artificial flavors, sweeteners, dyes, and no SLS and this anticavity toothpaste is vegan. As if that weren't enough magic for both tubes, hello fluoride toothpaste is also not tested on animals. We're serious about being friendly.

Contact your dentist for our whitening kits, featuring the first ADA-accepted, syringe-delivered, take-home bleaching gel and prefilled trays. These teeth whitening kits safely whiten your teeth. Opalescence products are made in the USA with globally sourced materials.
